Pre-Game Insights: Wales will be playing without Gareth Bale, who retired from international football.
Craig Bellamy, the new Wales boss, has included Ollie Cooper, Mark Harris, and Leeds United goalkeeper Karl Darlow in the squad.
Turkey is high on confidence after making it to the EURO 2024 quarter-finals.
Real Madrid rising star Arda Gular, who had a successful EURO 2024 campaign, is a key player to watch for Turkey.
Under 2.5 goals have been netted in each of the previous three meetings between Wales and Turkey, suggesting a low-scoring affair.
